mapper.select: select * from orderDetail join `order` on orderDetail.od_or_code = `order`.or_code join `option` on orderDetail.od_ot_num = `option`.ot_num join goods on `option`.ot_gs_num = goods.gs_num join address on `order`.or_ad_num = address.ad_num where or_mb_num = #{mb_num} order by od_num desc
